name: Billy Pancakes' Scrapbooking Challange
description:
Billy Pancakes' Scrapbooking Challenge

This is the third game in the Billy Pancakes-series and takes place between Billy Pancakes and the Rabid Carrot Munchers and Billy Pancakes and his Quest for Affordable Eye Surgery.

Your mission is to help Billy Pancakes in his scrapbooking career. The final goal is to win the WC FINAL battle of scrapbooking.

Controls

Use mouse or touch controls to point and click.
